snippet: With Generation Listen, NPR, like other old-media companies, is working to build connections to a younger audience.
abstract: National Public Radio hosts party during South by Southwest Interactive conference to kick off its youth initiative Generation Listen, new campaign designed to build stronger connections with a 20-something audience.
lead_paragraph: With Generation Listen, NPR, like other old-media companies, is working to build connections to a younger audience.

headline.seo: NPR’s Generation Listen Seeks Audiences in Their 20s
headline.main: NPR Wants to Click With Those Who Tweet
headline.print_headline: NPR Wants to Click With Those Who Tweet

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
